properties.title: AEOLUS+INNOVATION - COLOR
properties.description: Assessing the feasibility of deriving an in-water AEOLUS product from the analysis of the ocean sub-surface backscattered component of the 355 nm signal acquired by the ALADIN (Atmospheric LAser Doppler INstrument).
properties.osc:name: AEOLUS+ INNOVATION - CDOM-PROXY RETRIEVAL FROM AEOLUS OBSERVATIONS (COLOR)
osc:consortium: CNR-RESEARCH INSTITUTE FOR GEO-HYDROLOGICAL PROTECTION ‚ IRPI (IT)
